QuestData.Title: Neeka Bloodscar
QuestData.Description: There is much work to do in recovering from the assault and bracing ourselves for the next one. I will need coordination from all of our scouts.$B$BNeeka Bloodscar is our finest tracker, trained in the harsh Badlands. She has been sent west to Splinterspear Junction to watch for Alliance activity.$B$BGo to Neeka, $n. Tell her of what has occured in Stonard. Assist her in any way she requires.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Neeka Bloodscar at Splinterspear Junction.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope the sight of my sniveling amuses you, $n. It will be the only joy here.
